sentences.english: From the very early days of cocoa the peoples of Central America used beans as a form of payment.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，美洲中部的先民就用可可豆作为支付方式。

sentences.english: Let’s discuss some of the best ways to find online coupons.
sentences.chinese: 先民，就让我们来讨论一些淘到网络优惠券的好方法。

sentences.english: The birth of Torch Festival stems from of the ancient Yi people's worshiping of fire.
sentences.chinese: 火把节的诞生始于彝族先民对火的崇拜。

sentences.english: The ancestors of the Tibetan race built up Gouding old kingdom from the Spring and Autumn Era to the Han and Jin dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 自春秋至汉晋时代，壮族先民创建了句町古国。

sentences.english: The oldest printing technology in the world is china's engraving printing.
sentences.chinese: 世界最古老的印刷术，是中国先民发明的雕版印刷。

sentences.english: But at that time Chinese ancestors, are also being gradually the transition to the patriarchal society.
sentences.chinese: 只是当时华夏先民，也正在逐步向父系社会过渡。

sentences.english: Measurement technique accounts for the uncertainty is the future of our ancestors to grasp a valuable attempt.
sentences.chinese: 占测术正是先民把握未来不确定性的一种可贵尝试。

sentences.english: In Prehistoric times, our ancestors in the Yellow River Delta started to spin and weave to cover their bodies from being cold.
sentences.chinese: 史前时期，黄河三角洲先民就为遮体御寒而纺线织布。

sentences.english: Why ancient Chinese people wanted to create a loong?
sentences.chinese: 那么，中国古代的先民们为什么要创造出龙的形象呢？

sentences.english: The tribal dance was a spectacle of barbaric splendour.
sentences.chinese: 部落舞展示了一场五颜六色的半开化先民的奇观。

sentences.english: Phoenix is a sacred figure worshipped by ancient Chinese and a sign of noble status.
sentences.chinese: 凤是中国古代先民崇拜的对象，也是皇室身份的象征。

sentences.english: The Yi people consider water the origin of life and the mother of world creatures.
sentences.chinese: 彝族先民视水为生命之源，万物之母。

sentences.english: To sacrifice the three gods is derived from the nature worship of ancient Chinese to heaven, Earth and water.
sentences.chinese: 三官信仰渊源于中国古代先民对天地水的自然崇拜。

sentences.english: Why ancient Chinese people wanted to create a dragon?
sentences.chinese: 那么，中国古代的先民们为什么要创造出龙的形象呢？

sentences.english: Saman religion is a primitive one of the Manchu nationality and their ancestors, in which willow worship occupies an important position.
sentences.chinese: 萨满教是满族及其先民信仰的多神崇拜的原始宗教。

sentences.english: The ancestors worship of the gods.

definition: ancient hominid species such as Homo erectus, Neanderthal man etc
the Bronze Age/also written 青銅時代|青铜时代[Qing1 tong2 Shi2 dai4]
fishing and hunting/fig. to loot/to plunder
Fuxi or Fu Hsi, legendary Chinese emperor 2852-2738 BC, mythical creator of fishing, trapping, and writing
Yangshao neolithic culture from the central Yellow river basin, with red and black pottery
working people/the workers of Socialist theory or of the glorious Chinese past
Dawenkou culture (c. 4100-2600 BC), Neolithic culture based in today's Shandong area 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
